question: Can you find the latest research on energy-efficient building materials and generate a code snippet to calculate energy savings?
true_answer: Latest research on energy-efficient building materials includes innovations in thermal insulation and sustainable composites. A code snippet to calculate energy savings has been generated.

steps.content: Can you find the latest research on energy-efficient building materials and generate a code snippet to calculate energy savings?
Plan: 1) Search for the latest research on energy-efficient building materials. 2) Generate a code snippet to calculate energy savings. 3) Return the results to the user.
Searching for the latest research on energy-efficient building materials.
Latest research includes innovations in thermal insulation and sustainable composites.
Generating a code snippet to calculate energy savings based on insulation efficiency.
Code snippet generated: def calculate_energy_savings(initial_energy, efficiency_gain): return initial_energy * (1 - efficiency_gain)
What are some key benefits of these new materials?
Plan: 1) Search for key benefits of new energy-efficient building materials. 2) Return the information to the user.
Searching for key benefits of new energy-efficient building materials.
Key benefits include improved thermal performance, reduced environmental impact, and long-term cost savings.
